This file contains a description on the files available in the experiment
	0-1-0-1-0-MLM-conf-drug-palette-output.yaml : Contains the configurations after ending the runner.
	0-1-0-1-0-MLM-conf-drug-palette-input.yaml : Contains the configurations when starting the runner.
	 You can feed the same file again as configurations and gain the same results.
Output files and their descriptions:
